newsitem.title: CANADA: Philex Gold ends IPO, starts trading.
newsitem.headline: Philex Gold ends IPO, starts trading.

text.p: Philex Gold Inc said on Monday it has completed a public offering of 7.3 million common shares at a price of C$11 each.
Philex Gold said 3.2 million of its common shares in an initial public offering and its Filipino parent company, Philex Mining Corp sold 4.2 million common shares which it held through a subsidiary.
The offering raised gross proceeds of C$80.3 million. After paying underwriting fees, Philex Gold said it was left with C$33.249 million to be dedicated to exploration.
Philex Mining Corp received C$43.035 million which will be used to retire debt.
Philex Gold's common shares started trading on the Toronto Stock Exchange today.
